Description:
Live an executive lifestyle!
Live  an  executive  lifestyle  in  this  sumptuous  4-­?bedroom  family  home  with  superb  westerly  views  over Corio Bay, the You Yangs and Geelong, as well as rural vitas to the east. Set near the golf course, boat ramp and rail trail, the lifestyle offered is a privileged one!
The floor plan delivers rooms with grand proportions. The lavish use of Caesarstone and porcelain denote quality, whilst ducted heating and cooling ensure absolute comfort.
Impressive living zones on the lower level encourage a social, indoor-­?outdoor lifestyle and provide inviting spaces for individual activities. The living hub is wrapped by a large deck with swim spa. This magnificent alfresco zone doubles the footprint for undercover entertaining. The first-­?class kitchen features  quality  European  appliances,  huge  island  bench  and  butler’s  pantry.  For  media  buffs,  the  quiet lounge is ideal, whilst the open plan office, visible from the hub, provides a safe homework zone.
Private living and bedrooms are nestled upstairs. Spectacular bay sunsets fill the family room with golden  light.  The  balcony  further  embraces  the  breathtaking  scene  and  the  kitchenette  adds  convenience. Countryside views steal the show in the vast master suite, complete with dressing room and deluxe en suite with spa. Three further bedrooms share a luxurious family bathroom. Garaging  is  ideal  for  tradesmen  or  ‘toys’  and  includes  an  oversized  attached  DLUG,  an  internal  driveway with court access, high clearance carport and detached DLUG.
A 5kw solar array and 8000L rainwater storage feature in the long list of impressive extras!
View without delay!
Insights: 21 Wintersun Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A FABULOUS BIG FAMILY HOME, BAY VIEWS AND BIG GARAGE, BOAT/CARAVAN ACCOMODATION.
This well designed home is custom built, situated in one of the prime positions in the village and is within walking distance of schools, shops and parklands. A split level home with the rumpus room on the lower level, another second living, the third living area includes dining, well equipped kitchen and large living space all opening to a large wrap around balcony... great for entertaining. Four bedrooms, master with ensuite and WIR, others have BIR'S, study or fifth bedroom, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features include central heating and air-conditioning, fans, tinted windows, walk in pantry, s/s appliances, spa bath, drying cabinet, quality window furnishings and so much more. A big garage, has two roller doors but also fits more than two vehicles...very big and room for more. So much space, allows for living with ease for a large family, entertain well, have plenty of room for the visitors...A great home.

Description:
Magnificent family home brimming with upgrades
Brimming with upgrades and a high spec interior, this classy 4-bedroom family home boasts great style and space. The floorplan flows freely and features 3 living areas, a dedicated office, master suite with superior ensuite , and 'bug-free' alfresco room that merges seamlessly with indoor living. Rear access is another highly-sought feature, allowing secure storage of a boat, caravan or extra vehicles. The sitting, kitchen, living, and dining spaces all overlook the bright alfresco room - an ideal design for entertaining. The stylish kitchen, with full butler's pantry, includes Caesar stone, 90cm Blanco cooker and range hood, soft-close cabinetry and Bosch dishwasher.
Kids will love the zone-able rumpus room at the rear, perfect as a theatre room. The office suits those with a home business, and the sunny backyard, with lawn, sheds and a kitchen garden is a safe haven for the family to enjoy.
Superb above-standard features include; acoustic insulation in the master and minor BR wing, quality storage systems in the master's WIR, storage room in the minor BR wing, an internal stone feature wall, bifold glazing and retractable flyscreens to the alfresco room and exposed aggregate outdoor surfacing.
A gas log fireplace, reverse cycle AC and ducted heating tailor the climate. The DLUG boosts lifestyle and safety. Set in a quiet low thoroughfare pocket close to kinder, primary school, Drysdale village shops, beaches and the golf course, a relaxed bayside lifestyle awaits!
View ASAP!
* Classy 4BR family home in a quiet pocket in Clifton Springs brimming with upgrades
* 3 living areas, a dedicated office, master BR with en suite and impressive alfresco room
* Kitchen with full butler's pantry, Caesar stone, 90cm Blanco cooker and Bosch dishwasher
* Gas log fireplace, reverse cycle AC and ducted heating tailor the climate
* Rear access from Side Street allows secure storage of a boat, caravan or extra vehicles
* Close to kinder, primary school, Drysdale village shops, beaches and the golf course
Insights: 28 Gumbowie Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
GREAT POTENTIAL, MAKE IT YOURS
Homes on corner blocks are generally popular. Options abound with this home. Currently tenanted with tenants who are happy to stay on. You might choose to add this to your portfolio or to begin one. Clifton Springs is a very affordable place to get started with your first home. Or you may be looking to downsize and looking to establish a garden. Private rear yard with new fence. Centrally heated for your comfort in winter and verandas provide the necessary shade in the summer months. Choices for sitting outside enable you to pick your spot depending on weather. Why do I live in this town? Let me tell you why, we moved to this location 30 years ago and have never looked back. Our children have enjoyed playing their sports here, we have enjoyed the many and varied options of restaurants and cafes. It is a quiet place away from the busy coastal resorts and has provided all our daily requirements, including medical, shopping, public transport etc. Demographically balanced with families and retirees it makes for a good town to belong to.

Description:
A GREAT STARTER (APPROX 658 SQM) , ECO FRIENDLY A REAL BONUS AND TOP SPOT.
Needs cosmetic work, not a big home so it will not take long to renovate under roof line. The big bonus is the size of the land and the position, close to schools, shops, supermarket, great parklands and a short walk for the daily swim at the end of the street. Lounge room, combined kitchen and meals area, adjacent laundry, hallway through to three bedrooms and central bathroom. Features include solar power, solar hot water and grey water, heater and air-conditioned. Double carport, garden shed and long back verandah. A great investment for the future, develop STCA.

Description:
CALLING ALL 1ST HOME BUYERS OR TRADIES
Perfect opportunity awaits the first home buyer or young tradesman looking to refresh this structurally sound home in a quiet elevated Court.
Positioned on approx. 585M2 this brick and tile home offers three bedrooms, L shaped lounge dining area, Laminate kitchen plus casual meals area and central bathroom and the bonus of water views from the front portion of the home.
Externally there is ample room to move and included is a steel double garage for car storage or a useful workshop.
Move in and improve your investment and the hard yards will be rewarded with this entry level purchase on the Bellarine.

Description:
Fine Tuned and Ready to Enjoy
Thinking about a house and land package, think again. All the work has already been done for you. This Modern 3 year old family home is located within an established area of Clifton Springs. Abundant room for the family with four generous sized bedrooms, master bedroom with the coveted walk in robe. The other three bedrooms have built in robes. Tiled hallway flows through to the open plan living/dining area with natural light, opening out to the undercover alfresco for entertaining during the warmer months. Modern kitchen with a large walk in pantry, Gas cooktop, electric stove and Island bench. Parents can sit back in the formal lounge, while the kids entertain themselves in the kids retreat. Offering ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling throughout the home, double lockup garage with internal access and garden shed, this property is perfect for the family. Located close to the golf course, schools & public transport, this Burbank home has been designed to achieve a minimum 6.5 Star Energy Rating and is still under builders warranty.

Description:
CUSTOM BUILD, SOLAR PASSIVE, SO MANY EXTRA DESIGN FEATURES .
Built by Hotondo Homes for the owner, this home has that special feel, a leafy aspect to the north where inside flows to the outside area with ease. Generous lounge room, spacious kitchen with large walk in pantry, separate dining and a study space. Three bedrooms, the master is large with bathroom and WIR, second has BIR'S, third is currently used as a studio. Central bathroom including laundry and loads of cupboard space...a large area. Features include gas log fire, two split systems, double glaze windows, leadlight, fans, solar boost hot water, polished concrete, pressed metal, porcelain tiles, window seat and quality fittings. Undercover entertaining area is perfect, private and matured gardens. Double garage, garden shed, watertank and space if wanted for another vehicle

Description:
'Home Beautiful'
Without hesitation I can proclaim this property is simply 'home beautiful' - boasting immaculate presentation it will appeal to buyers who only settle for the best!
Don't be fooled by its colonial influenced cottage facade; step inside and embrace the impressive high ceilings and grand proportions.
The master bedroom is simply stunning, big colonial windows perfectly frame landscaped gardens and provide an abundance of natural light.
Floor to ceiling built in robes and a walk through bathroom complete the picture.
The 'money room' of this property and personal favourite is undoubtedly the kitchen/family/meals area. An exceptionally well appointed kitchen showcases great style and is most importantly very user friendly. Once again the living area possesses big beautiful windows which perfectly frame established gardens and provide a wonderfully private casual living zone.
All the modern comforts, flawless presentation, beautifully landscaped gardens, single remote garage, additional off street parking simply make this property a stand out within the market.
Tim Cain : 0429 067 808

Description:
Immaculate- Lovely Bay Views!
This immaculately presented home sits high on the block with views across the bay toward Geelong and is a real find. Offering spacious lounge and formal dining (if desired) plus generously sized kitchen, meals and family area. All 3 bedrooms are a great size and have built in robes. The master bedrooms' robe will certainly impress the lady of the house. A central bathroom acts as an ensuite to the master bedroom. Central heating and reverse cycle cooling keep the home comfortable all year round. The gardens have been lovingly tended and are easy care. Rain water tank. Double carport plus a double garage allows an abundance of car accommodation and workshop areas. This home is a delight to inspect and is sure to attract plenty of buyer interest!

Description:
METICULOUSLY MAINTAINED AND UPDATED, JUST ACROSS THE ROAD TO THE BAY
Some would say the best spot in town, hard to disagree on a beautiful summer day with the jetty, golf and bowling clubs as well as The Dell ....all within walking distance, the best kept secret on the Bellarine Peninsula. Formal lounge and dining as well as second living space combining kitchen and meals. Three generous bedrooms , all with BIR'S, master with semi ensuite, study or sitting room, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. The outdoor undercover alfresco area opens from the second living, a big paved area surrounded by lush gardens giving extra privacy ...so easy to relax. Features include fan forced gas log fire, two split systems, dishwasher, pantry, loads of storage/cupboards, double glazed front windows, quality fittings and furnishings, so much more to inspect. Double carport and more room for the caravan or boat. You have nothing to do here at 175, a delightful home which has been much loved over the years and it shows. Call now for an inspection.

Description:
Executive Lifestyle Property with Own Beach
The driveway leads to a very private oasis set amongst beautiful landscaped gardens. The architect designed home is positioned to maximize the outlook to the Bay and beyond. Set on a 3630m2 allotment with direct access to the beach.
The Home features four bedrooms all with built in robes and the master serviced with ensuite. A well equipped kitchen leads to separate formal dining and family room opening to an entertaining deck. A circular staircase leads to a mezzanine level sitting room with breathtaking panoramic views. Internal access to the double garage with remote doors and separate storage area. The gardens are serviced by a watering system and rain water tanks. The property features an in ground swimming pool surrounded by Balinese inspired gardens with several hutches and lookouts. The beach is accessed by a professionally constructed stairway with rest bays to stop and contemplate the views.
This property has featured in many garden magazines and won awards in "Home Beautiful" and "The Weekly Times" It has also been part of the Australian's open garden schemes over the years.
Truly an impressive and imposing property that exudes a sense of refinement and prestige.
Insights: 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
BIG HOME, WALK TO THE JETTY, HAVE A DIP IN THE BAY.....JUST DO A LITTLE MORE WORK OUTSIDE.
A great opportunity to enjoy while taking your time to do some more maintenance outside and then sit back and know you have purchased in a great spot. Downstairs extra generous lounge room , spacious kitchen combined with large dining, four bedrooms with BIR'S, (two upstairs and two on the lower level), upstairs has a mezzanine level , playroom for the children or flexible use, another large second living room with adjacent study, 2 bathrooms (one on each level), the laundry completes the plan. Side verandah, upstairs balcony in need of repair, leafy and matured gardens which with further care will come back to delight the owner. No. 68 has the added attraction of backing on to nature walks which meander to the bay and parklands, the schools, shops, supermarket and medical clinic all here. Double carport, extra port space for the boat, garden shed and potting shed. A very interesting home with extra love to make it just so good!

Description:
Bay Front Home With Exceptional Water Panoramic Views
The uninterrupted bay side panorama doesn’t come any better than that at the west end of Bayshore Avenue. This property overlooks a strip of crown land located on the cliff edge, with the boat ramp below and the You Yangs and Melbourne skyline beyond. Spectacular water views surround this special 2-storey home and are breathtaking from both levels.
The home is expansive with north-facing upper and lower living hubs, both with fully equipped kitchens and large outdoor entertaining areas that embrace the spectacular water vista. There are 4 spacious bedrooms, including master with split system, en suite, walk-in robe and balcony, plus a large office ideal for business or homework. Excellent garaging provides 5 protected spaces for vehicles or ‘toys’ plus a large workshop with ample storage.
Quality design features ensure comfort and style, and include; tinted double glazing, comprehensive insulation, Neff appliances and walk-in pantry in the upstairs kitchen, gas log fires and split systems in both living hubs and ceiling fans throughout.
The protected central courtyard is a lovely winter suntrap, and the enchanting bay side garden offers space for children’s play equipment and a vegetable garden.
The incredible views encourage relaxation at home, and the location provides lifestyle convenience. Set within metres of the boat ramp and The Dell, and within a short stroll of the golf course and primary school, this home is ideal for families or retirees who love to entertain.
Be the first to view this stunning home!
Insights: 168 Bayshore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 1999 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Big Spacious Block
This larger than average block is approximately 702m2. With a wide 18 metre frontage and depth of 38 metres there is plenty of room for the house, yard and extra shedding. Bay and You Yangs view are possible from a second storey.
It also has a 3 metre side access to the reserve at the rear. No covenants or building design guidelines to hassle with, so you are free to build what you want (STCA). Don't miss out on this space.

Description:
Quaint Home, Magnificent Position
This quaint and cosy three bedroom home is situated in an outstanding position overlooking
the Clifton Springs Golf and Bowling Clubs and sparkling Corio Bay. All within walking distance. Stunning bay views spill out before you from the front porch and adjoining lounge room. Located merely minutes away are the Bellarine's best wineries and cafes, local amenities and public transport. Purchasers will have the opportunity to secure their future investment in this rapidly appreciating area of the Bellarine. The property will be auctioned on March 18th, 2017 at 12pm.
Featuring a substantial, enclosed outdoor living area, the front of the home is afforded uninterrupted garden and bay views. Quality cafe blinds provide privacy and protection from the weather all year round. Natural light drenches this delightful home from end to end with established trees providing shade during the warmer months. A central gas log fire provides heating to the open plan dining and living area during those cooler months. Three sizeable bedrooms are located close to the family bathroom and laundry.
The lovely established rear garden is fully fenced for privacy and makes for a sizeable outdoor entertaining area complete with stone BBQ. Bonus features include two water tanks with pumps to service the garden area, solar boosted gas hot water, a 5.2 x 7.3m lock up garage/shed. The advantageous corner position also provides for dual access to the property. A property not to be overlooked
Rhonda Humpage : 0457 313 609
Insights: 7 Springs Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Opportunity not to be Missed
If you like quiet living then 23 Carawatha Avenue will not disappoint. Located in a quiet cul de sac, this home surely wonâ??t stay on the market long before it is snapped up by first home buyers or savvy investors looking to increase their investment portfolio.The home has ample space for the family with formal lounge and rumpus rooms at the front and rear. Neatly presented kitchen and meals area will become a hub of daily activity. Three large bedrooms, all with built in robes provide great storage and all rooms are recently fitted with new Holland blinds. Having recently received new carpets and been freshly repainted painted thereâ??s not much left to do but to move in. Situated on a 585m2 block, there's plenty of room for all the family and pets in the secured backyard. With separate entertainment area and sheltered courtyard thereâ??s plenty of room to invite friends and family around. Ample off street undercover parking. Clifton Springs is fast becoming a hot spot on the Bellarine Peninsula and with all of the award winning restaurants and wineries close at hand youâ??ll be the envy of all. Close to schools, local shops, golf course, walking trails and the Clifton Springs jetty, an inspection at 23 Carawatha Avenue is a must for you to fully appreciate what this home really has on offer.

Description:
GREAT FAMILY HOME, AFFORDABLE AND CLOSE TO JETTY, CLUBS AND SCHOOLS.
A period home which has been renovated and still has the character of the era while providing more space for the modern lifestyle. The open plan area combines a new gourmet kitchen (beautiful big timber bench), living and separate dining space, this is all new while maintaining that warm and earthy feel as attention in renovating has been to keep the appeal of the Edwardian. Four bedrooms, three with BIR'S, central bathroom, 2 toilets and european laundry. Features include new appliances, extra large walk in butlers pantry, wood heater, split system, wooden floorboards, fantastic lighting and more to entice. The front garden is enclosed and provides a private space as well as the back decking with some bay views. Carport and off street parking available for more cars, garden sheds as well. So close to recreation areas including The Dell. A very affordable option on the Bellarine Peninsula.

Description:
It's What's Behind The fence That Is Important!
This meticulously cared for home is a pleasure to inspect. Sitting behind a private facade the home is well maintained with nothing to be done. The main living area offers spacious lounge and separate formal dining. The well equipped kitchen will impress the chef of the family with loads of stage space and walk in pantry. All bedrooms are generously sized and have robes. The master bedroom has a full ensuite and a terrific walk in robe with loads of storage space. Bedroom 2 has access to the central family bathroom which effectively creates another ensuite. The home is kept comfortable all year round with central gas heating and evaporative cooling. The gardens that surround the home have been created to be easy care but are a pleasure to wander through. For the man of the house the garage will impress. Room for 2 cars plus a workshop area. There is room at the front of the property for boat or caravan storage too. An inspection of this lovely home will not disappoint.
